snack.name: Snack
snack.flavor: Organic, locally-sourced zombie-killing fuel in eco-friendly packaging.

energydrink.name: Energy Drink
energydrink.flavor: It's got Electrolytes. It's what plants crave.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: Gain 5 AP. Can exceed your max.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.flavor: It's even got a dinosaur on it!

firstaidkit.name: First Aid Kit
firstaidkit.flavor: It's basically just two bandages in a box.

ammo.name: Reload
ammo.description: Fill 1 Ranged weapon to its max ammo.
ammo.flavor: All-purpose, one size fits all ammunition.

backpack.name: Fanny Pack
backpack.description: When this is equipped, increase your available inventory slots by 1.

holster.name: Weapon Holster
holster.description: When this is equipped, increase your available weapon slots by 1 (Up to a maximum of 4 weapon slots)

belt.name: Utiliy Belt
belt.description: Delete this item. Increase your available equipment slots by 1 (Up to a maximum of 5 equipment slots)

barricade1.name: Sandbags!
barricade1.description: Delete this item. Build a barricade anywhere with 2d6 health.
barricade1.flavor: Made with really, really lightweight sand.

barricade2.name: Boards and Nails
barricade2.description: Delete this item. Build a barricade with 4d6 health

armor1.name: Improvised Armor
armor1.flavor: Enough Duct Tape can do just about anything.

armor2.name: Sporting Pads
armor2.flavor: Perfect for doing that sport with the sporting ball.

armor4.name: Plate Armor
armor4.description: Increase your Armor by 8. Reduce your dodge by 2.
armor4.flavor: Time to get medieval on their ass.

dodge1.name: Exercise Clothes
dodge1.flavor: You feel just a tad bit more limber.

dodge3.name: Shield
dodge3.flavor: It's not made of vibranium, but it's a decent shield.

dodge4.name: Really nice sneakers.
dodge4.description: Increase your dodge roll by 6. Has no effect if you have any bonus armor at all. Only one can be equipped at a time.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Deal 40 damage to a square within 7 squares and all its adjacent squares.
grenade.flavor: Just a casual fragmentation grenade lying around.

molotov.name: Molotov
molotov.description: Light a square and its adjacent squares on fire within 7 squares for 3 rounds. Deals 10 damage and 5 ongoing damage to anyone who walks through.
molotov.flavor: Liquor? I barely even lit her on fire!

knife.name: Knife
knife.flavor: Great for cutting vegetables, fruit, and brains.

baseballbat.name: Baseball Bat
baseballbat.flavor: It is now past the time... for America's favorite pastime.

nailbat.name: Nailbat
nailbat.flavor: Peanut Butter and Jelly. Burger and Fries. Ham and Cheese. Nails and a Bat.

machete.name: Machete
machete.flavor: Great tool for re-deading the undead.

katana.name: Katana
katana.flavor: Forgive me sensei, I must go all out. Just this once.

sword.name: Sword
sword.flavor: Why socialize when you could study the way of the sword?

chainsaw.name: Chainsaw
chainsaw.flavor: It's about to be a massacre.

lawnmower.name: Lawnmower
lawnmower.description: The turn you use this, you attack as you move, dealing damage to each square you move through

bow.name: Bow
bow.description: If you kill your target, leave a marker at the target. You can regain all spent Arrows used this turn if you pick up the marker

machinegun.name: Machine Gun
machinegun.flavor: Our bullets will blot out the sun.

grenadelauncher.name: Grenade Launcher
grenadelauncher.description: This cannot be reloaded. If hitting single targets, it will damage adjacent squares to the target.
grenadelauncher.flavor: Our bullets will blot out the sun.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: This cannot be reloaded. This weapon fires in a line of 5 spaces, dealing damage to all targets within the line.
flamethrower.flavor: Turns out the zombies have a weakness to being lit on freakin' fire.
